body.p: Once upon a time, a farmer and his wife lived in a tiny cottage in the German countryside. They worked the land together, raising animals and crops, and they had many friends who flocked to their home for dinner and tea and all manner of parties. The farmer doted on his wife, and she on him, but for all their joys in life, they had never had a child of their own.
